appDesc.message: This extension is not only block Content Farm but also 'Critic' the articles.

header.message: You'll be able to open the content farm, and you can watch other users' reviews and suggestions before deciding whether to continue?
header.description: Header of warning in stop page

p2.message: Refuse fake news and exaggerated articles, from now on ~
p2.description: Header of warning in stop page

remind.message: If you can, please help us leave comments on the article to against these fake online cultures
remind.description: Header of warning in stop page

body.message: Continue? Back if you are annoyed with them.

details.description: Click to open options from stop page
